name: Ice Hockey League FREE
description:
Test your skills to prove you are the best hockey player in the championship. Think about your team strategy and hurry up to move your caps to score a goal in the hockey goal. Hockey League is a game that combines speed, accuracy and finger tapping ability.

You're going to have fun moving caps and playing against the opposing team! Don´t wait any longer!

-GAME MODE:
The game mode is very simple. Five players compete against five on the other team. The team that scores 4 goals first wins the game. To score the goal you can move the players in the direction and power you want.

You need to be quick! The rival team can make a move at any time and spoil the play. Prove your ability by anticipating their moves!

The game mode is like classic ones in the hockey championships. There are different rounds you must pass to reach the final and be the trophy winner.

-GET COINS:
Within the game you will find the option to exchange coins to upgrade the skills of the players, change hockey team and level. You will get these coins as you win games.

-3 LEVELS:
There are three levels of difficulty: beginner, intermediate and professional. At the simplest level you will begin to play from the dirt hockey field to finish in a great stadium with fans who cheer your team up incessantly, which corresponds to the professional level.

-BONUS:
We give you a hint: It is not necessary to wait for the ball stops to make your move. If you take advantage of this trick you can do most passes and more easily reach the opponent's goal.
